document_data.name: Kim-un-guru
document_data.mainbody: '''Kim-un-guru''' was a [[korobokuru]] [[wu jen]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kim-un-guru took care of the [[Korobokuru Shrine]], dedicated to [[Raven (spirit)|Raven]] the spirit god. He often openly voiced his opinions, wandered drunk, and embarrassed others in public.
document_data.Personality: Kim-un-guru liked drinking, singing the "old songs," and dancing. He played the role of the barbaric outsider, being intentionally outrageous and insulting. He became a popular figure in the area, doing things that locals could not because of their social rules.
